name: auto_mart
description: Auto Mart is an online marketplace for automobiles of diverse makes, model or body type. With Auto Mart, users can sell their cars or buy from trusted dealerships or private sellers.

scripts.test: nyc --reporter text --reporter html mocha --reporter spec --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill server/test/*.js --exit
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: Segun Ogundipe
